name: Exploring New Ventures
description: This experiential learning course allows students to explore the inner working of new venture companies. The majority of the course consists of a placement with Toronto-based start-ups, with oversight from the Impact Centre. In-class activities facilitate the application of entrepreneurial tools to develop the students’ entrepreneurial skills.
prerequisites: IMC200H1/ RSM100H1/ MGT100H1. 8.0 FCEs in any subject.
